      • getStudentGrades

        public void getStudentGrades​(int studentId,
                             ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        This Java function retrieves a student's grades information from a MySQL database and sends it to a client.
        Parameters:
        studentId - The ID of the student whose grades are being retrieved.
        client - The client parameter is an instance of the ConnectionToClient class, containing the student grades information back to the client.

      • getTestQuestions

        public java.util.ArrayList<logic.InTestQuestion> getTestQuestions​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                  int testid)
        This function retrieves a list of test questions from a database based on a given test ID.
        Parameters:
        conn - The connection object used to connect to the database.
        testid - an integer representing the ID of the test for which the questions are being retrieved.
        Returns:
        This method returns an ArrayList of InTestQuestion objects. If there are no questions found, it returns null.

        Parameters:

        client -

      • getTest

        public logic.Test getTest​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                          int testid)
        This function retrieves a test object from the database along with a list of student IDs who are eligible to take the test.
        Parameters:
        conn - The parameter "conn" is a Connection object that represents the connection to the database.
        testid - an integer representing the ID of the test being retrieved from the database.
        Returns:
        The method returns a Test object.

      • ApplyingInfoExisted

        public int ApplyingInfoExisted​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                               logic.TestCode t)
        This function checks if a test code exists in a database table and returns the corresponding exam ID if it does.
        Parameters:
        conn - A Connection object representing a connection to a database.
        t - TestCode object that contains the code for the exam being checked.
        Returns:
        The method is returning an integer value which represents the test ID of an open exam that matches the provided test code. If no matching open exam is found, the method returns -1.
